snippet: Civil unions in New Jersey deprive same-sex couples of important rights and benefits.
abstract: Editorial cites civil rights suit in New Jersey state court that could finally change shameful fact that New Jersey has refused to follow other states in the Northeast by granting marriage equality to gay couples; notes case came about because New Jersey's civil unions for same-sex couples deprives them of important rights and benefits under federal law.
lead_paragraph: Civil unions in New Jersey deprive same-sex couples of important rights and benefits.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
